alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Grand Isle (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 4:29PM EDT until July 21 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Clinton County in northern New York... Northeastern Grand Isle County in northwestern Vermont... Northwestern Franklin County in northwestern Vermont... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 429 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over East Alburgh, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Alburgh Village, Swanton Village, Highgate Falls, St. Albans City, Sheldon, Swanton, St. Albans Town, South Alburgh, Highgate, Alburgh, Alburgh Dunes State Park, North Hero, Franklin, Isle La Motte, Fairfield, Wagner Point, North Hero State Park, Sheldon Junction, Alburg Tongue, and Butler Island. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
